      • doNonClosedLoanAccountsExistForClient

        @Query(value="select case when (count (loan) > 0) then true else false end from Loan loan where loan.client.id = :clientId and loan.loanStatus in (100,200,300,303,304,700)")

      • doNonClosedLoanAccountsExistForProduct
